name: truck-dashboard-server
description: Express API for Trucking Load & Expense Dashboard

scripts.test: bash -lc 'shopt -s nullglob; for f in test/*.test.js; do echo Running "$f"; NODE_ENV=test DATABASE_URL=postgresql://truck:truckpass@localhost:5432/truckdb_test node --test --test-reporter=spec "$f" || exit 1; done'
scripts.test:cov: c8 --reporter=text --reporter=lcov bash -lc 'shopt -s nullglob; for f in test/*.test.js; do echo Running "$f"; NODE_ENV=test DATABASE_URL=postgresql://truck:truckpass@localhost:5432/truckdb_test node --test --test-reporter=spec "$f" || exit 1; done'
